it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model.cards

Class BlackCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model.cards.Card
      • it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model.cards.BlackCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BlackCard
extends Card
    This class represents the fifth card type, used in case of a match with five players. Black cards are bad actions (such as theft, kidnap, blackmail): they cost a lot of faith points but give a great bonus in terms of resources.
    See Also:
